path_title: Priya A Shesh's Digital Skills Empowerment Path
path_description: This personalized learning journey is designed to equip Priya A Shesh with in-demand digital skills in Social Media Management and Basic Programming, enabling her to pursue exciting career opportunities in India's growing digital economy.

milestones.title: Social Media Marketing Fundamentals for Priya
milestones.description: This beginner course introduces Priya to the core concepts of social media marketing, focusing on content creation, audience engagement, and platform-specific best practices.
milestones.project: Develop a social media strategy for a local business in India, including a content calendar and engagement plan.

milestones.title: Advanced Social Media Strategies for Priya
milestones.description: Building on Priya's foundational knowledge, this advanced course delves into paid advertising, influencer marketing, and data-driven campaign optimization.
milestones.project: Run a simulated paid social media campaign with a defined budget and target audience, analyzing the results and optimizing for improved performance.

milestones.title: Introduction to Python Programming for Priya
milestones.description: This beginner course provides Priya with a solid foundation in Python, covering basic syntax, data types, and control flow.
milestones.project: Build a simple text-based game in Python, demonstrating the use of variables, loops, and conditional statements.

milestones.title: Data Analysis with Python for Priya
milestones.description: This advanced course builds on Priya's Python skills, focusing on data manipulation, analysis, and visualization using popular libraries like Pandas and Matplotlib.
milestones.project: Analyze a real-world dataset using Python, creating visualizations and generating insights relevant to a chosen domain.

career_opportunities.title: Social Media Manager
career_opportunities.description: Manage social media presence for businesses, creating engaging content and building online communities.

career_opportunities.title: Digital Marketing Specialist
career_opportunities.description: Develop and execute comprehensive digital marketing strategies across various channels, including social media and search engine optimization.

career_opportunities.title: Data Analyst
career_opportunities.description: Collect, analyze, and interpret data to extract meaningful insights and support business decision-making.
